analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern the establishment, modification, or delegation of authority to various governmental bodies, committees, or councils. They cover a range of topics, including interagency cooperation, broadband access in rural areas, strategic forces, disaster assistance, transportation expenses, food assistance, airspace reservations, coal industry regulations, international organizations, and physical fitness. A common thread is the use of executive power to create or adjust governmental structures and processes to address specific issues or achieve policy goals.
title: Governmental Organization and Authority
